metadata.title: CVE-2017-12869 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The multiauth module in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.13 and earlier allows remoteattackers to bypass authentication context restrictions and use anauthentication source defined in config/authsources.php via vectors relatedto improper validation of user input.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
